title: Nanocaps from Scalania – New Way to Fund your Startup

speakers.name: Dr. Klaas Rackebrandt
speakers.description: Pioneering nanocap company financing by introducing a new market segment for IPOs in Germany. With strong roots in the Swedish ecosystem we are able to provide access to over 800,000 investors while building the IPO market in Germany. Founded 3 nanocap companies | Over a decade in...
